caption.p: Phenotypic characterization and growth curve of the archaeon Natrialba sp. M6. Orange pigmented colonies of archaeon M6 grown on ( A) M5 agar and in ( B) M5 broth. ( C) Scanning micrograph at a magnification of 20,000Ã—. ( D) Growth curve of Natrialba sp. M6 based on optical density (OD) and dry weight measurements.
